attributes.title: this app gave me gonorrhea :((((((((
attributes.review: as a US citizen i decided i had to see what this app was like, and i regret this decision more than anything else in my entire life. the app downloaded fine, but just moments after opening it and clicking a single button, i felt a horrible pain in my lower abdomen and started vomiting violently, working up a fever of 105. after heading to the doctor, i found out it was gonorrhea:( THANKS A LOT TRUMP
